ygData.subject: Re: A wizards message board?
ygData.msgSnippet: Only problem I have with this is that it requires you to go read another message board(I already have a bunch that I read). I kind of like the e-mail, I set up
ygData.messageBody:
Only problem I have with this is that it requires you to go read another
message board(I already have a bunch that I read). I kind of like the
e-mail, I set up a rule in Outlook to send all mail from this group to a
folder and I can read at my leisure and not have to worry about the message
being scrolled off.

But either way works for me.

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Spehar, David J
[mailto:David.Spehar@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 9:16 AM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: A wizards message board?

From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>

YES!!!!!

great idea!

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul McClung [mailto:p.e.mcclung@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 8:08 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] A wizards message board?


From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>

There seems to be enough people to participate in this,
would everyone like
me to setup a wizards message board? Then all the email
boxes can breathe
easy? And we can still ask all the questions we want?


It would just be a simple board, using WWWBoard or something
like that.

- Paul
